patthana18.6:1.1: Hetuṃ saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.6:3.1: Hetuṃ ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.6:5.1: Hetuṃ oghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.6:7.1: Hetuṃ yogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.6:9.1: Hetuṃ nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.6:11.1: Nahetuṃ parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
